title: Weld and Fitzhugh on slavery - argument

content.question: The views expressed by Fitzhugh would have been most likely to align with which of the following arguments?

choices.label: States’ rights should be secured from federal interference.
The judicial branch of government should be strengthened.
Tariffs on imported goods should be increased.

content.answer: States’ rights should be secured from federal interference.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and describe a claim and/or argument in a text-based or non-text-based source.
